Name: Wildness' Blessing
Desc: A memorable moment worth commemorating. Can be used to decorate your room.
Desc2: The Sunflint was woven and painted by several members of the Sons of Calydon. Although the craftsmanship is not complicated, it must have taken a lot of time to make it. The legend speaks of a hero who was saved from a sea of flames by divine protection... If such a space that defies natural laws truly harbors a deity, would it be an enemy to mankind, a friend, or merely a cold, detached observer of the world?
